mapper.insert: insert into seckill (seckill_name, seckill_description, start_time, end_time, banner_image, status, create_time, create_user) values (#{seckillName}, #{seckillDescription}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{bannerImage}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{createUser})
mapper.select:
select * from seckill
and seckill_name like concat('%', #{seckillName}, '%')
and status = #{status}
order by create_time desc
